trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_SEQ_00<tab>Stigma-4 has a shocking request.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the guardian Ea and mount the Miw Miisv.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_TODO_01<tab>Use Electric Flux to electrify intellectuals.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_TODO_02<tab>Report to Stigma-4.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_STIGMA4_000_001<tab>Commencing status report. Analysis of infantile Miw Miisv on Elysion indicates advanced proficiency in generating electrical stimuli.

TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_STIGMA4_000_002<tab>Verbal testimony from guardian Ea suggests contact with said bimodal output results in distinctive “sensations” in the non-corporeal subject. Such subjective experiences are predicted to positively impact environmental dynamis.

TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_STIGMA4_000_003<tab>Requesting assistance from closest organic life-form. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, please report to the abode of the Ea and receive instruction on the electrocution of consenting non-corporeal beings.

TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621A_000_010<tab>You must be the corporeal one I am to instruct. Very good─I would have you guide this Miw Miisv to administer electrotherapeutics upon two of my brethren whose rumination often takes them to Hollow of the Flesh.

TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621A_000_011<tab>Unadulterated lightning is quite striking, you know. The semifluidity of your form suggests a tendency towards parboiling, but you are nevertheless free to partake should you desire swift liberation from your mortal coil.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621A_000_012<tab>Did this child's movements overwhelm you? I do hope you make up in determination what your corporeal form so evidently lacks in coordination.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621B_000_020<tab>If there were but stimuli strong enough to rouse me from this torpor...
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_SYSTEM_100_020<tab>Speak with the guardian Ea to mount the Miw Miisv and electrify intellectuals.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621B_000_021<tab>My appendages tingle─my mind races! My thoughts transcend, I grasp the universe's innermost secrets...aaand they're gone. Profane exclamations!
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621B_000_022<tab>Transcendence, woooooo! ...Ahem. I mean, of course, that you may proceed to anoint me with the stimuli.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_SYSTEM_100_022<tab>Speak with the guardian Ea to mount the Miw Miisv and electrify intellectuals.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621B_000_023<tab>Aaaaaaaaah! Cascades of revelation, oceans of understanding! The risk of dependency looms, but the mind wants what it wants!

TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621B_000_024<tab>...<var 1A 02 /var>Ahem<var 1A 01 /var>. Do pardon my outburst─although we no longer possess the nervous systems of mortal meat sacks, one's consciousness still craves the occasional refreshment.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621B_000_025<tab>But to think that similar impulses once coursed throughout our systems at the slightest movement... How delightfully primitive!

TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621B_000_026<tab>Yes, I believe we shall soon grasp the nature of our erstwhile selves with regular exposure to these <var 1A 02 /var>sensations<var 1A 01 /var>. Do come and stimulate me again.

TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621C_300_020<tab>Pardon me, but I cannot but notice your current engulfment. Could you possibly facilitate the experience of “sensation”? My colleagues expound much upon its benefits, of late...
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_SYSTEM_300_020<tab>Speak with the guardian Ea to mount the Miw Miisv and electrify intellectuals.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621C_300_021<tab>Th-This is it! The very pseudo-physical euphoria I have heard so much about!
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621C_300_022<tab>At last, you return! My colleagues strive to surpass my comprehension─you must facilitate my stimulation at once.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_SYSTEM_400_022<tab>Speak with the guardian Ea to mount the Miw Miisv and electrify intellectuals.
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621C_300_023<tab>My psyche tingles! My consciousness sings!

TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621C_300_024<tab>With this stimulation, I feel assured of my comprehension of “sensation”─yet one question still plagues my mind. If the classic corporeal creature spends its waking moments inundated by such perceptions, how does it manage to accomplish anything at all?

TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_EAOMIA04621C_300_025<tab>Already I am consumed by the urge to succumb to temptation once more... But no─I must not relinquish my rationality. I shall ensure that my colleagues recognize my superior understanding ere delving into the pleasures of the imagined flesh...
TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_STIGMA4_000_030<tab>Return of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> confirmed. Elevated levels of static electricity detected. Requesting summary of completed mission.

TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_STIGMA4_000_031<tab>Verbal analysis complete. Subjects successfully achieved states of agitation and fleeting delusion of corporeal status by means of severe electrocution. Mission success.

TEXT_BANOMI115_04621_STIGMA4_000_032<tab>Nicety protocol engaged. Well done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Please accept this shiny recompense and lend your services to our cause once more.
